TemplateDescription.name: acfproject

Argument.name: component
Argument.help: The name of the component which will be automatically created.

ValueRestriction.description: This must be a valid C++ type name. It must start with an upper case letter.

Argument.name: namespace
Argument.help: The root namespace for the acfproject. It is used to resolve the initial component namespace.

TemplateDescription.Description: Create a new acfproject.The acfproject is a template for component based platform development. The resulting component will be managed by the ACF (Application Component Framework). For more information visit the Help Center in the PLCnext Community.

Example.Description: creates a new acfproject in the directory 'ProjectName' with the component 'ProjectNameComponent' in the namespace 'ProjectName'
creates a new acfproject in the directory 'ProjectName' with the component 'SomeComponent' in the namespace 'SomeNamespace'

Argument.name: no-datatypes-worksheet
Argument.help: Add this flag if a datatypes worksheet shall NOT be generated.

Argument.name: id
Argument.help: The GUID for the library. If this option is not used, the id stored in the project settings file will be used instead.

Argument.name: librarydescription
Argument.help: A description of the library. If this option is used, a project configuration file will be ignored. Use \n for linebreak and \" for quotation mark

Argument.name: libraryversion
Argument.help: The version of the library. If this option is used, a project configuration file will be ignored.

Argument.name: engineerversion
Argument.help: The version of the PLCnext Engineer for which this library shall be built.

Argument.name: solutionversion
Argument.help: The AdeSolutionVersion for which this library shall be built. Can not be used together with --engineerversion.
